excerpt: Spicy and delicious vegan version of cauliflower buffalo wings, perfect for game day or any party!

ingredients.name: Buffalo sauce
ingredients.notes: Or more depending on your preference

instructions: In a mixing bowl, combine the flour, garlic powder, paprika, and salt.
Add water to the mixture and whisk until smooth.
Add the cauliflower florets into the mixture and toss until evenly coated.
Place the coated cauliflower florets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown.
While the cauliflower is baking, combine the buffalo sauce and melted vegan butter in a mixing bowl.
Once the cauliflower is done, remove from the oven and toss in the buffalo sauce mixture.
Place the cauliflower back on the baking sheet and bake for an additional 5-7 minutes.
Serve hot with your favourite dipping sauce!
